Me encanta El Bitxo.  One of my favorite places when I'm want a cozy, chill yet sophisticated atmosphere.  El Bitxo offers warm lighting, nice wine, a few tapas (traditional and creative) and always has a fresh beautiful oversized flower arrangement.  It's the first spot that I take people to when they come to visit me in Barcelona.  I like sitting at the bar, where they have fans for hot days or in the corner so I can see everything - beware the bench seat sometimes pinches.  The menu is handwritten in front of the bar.  I always enjoy talking to the people that work there too - it's that warm and familiar.It's especially wonderful because at night you can enjoy the beautifully lit Palau de la Musica, a 5 second stroll away.
